title: Garrett and SinoTruk Collaborate on Next-Gen E-Powertrains
text: Garrett and SinoTruk Collaborate on Next-Gen E-Powertrains [Olivia Taylor](https://investorshangout.com/profile/view?id=79141)Updated: 10-17-2024 04:30 PM Groundbreaking Partnership in Electric Commercial Vehicles Garrett Motion Inc. and SinoTruk have recently formalized a significant collaboration to innovate in the realm of electric commercial vehicles. The two companies have signed a Letter of Intent (LoI), focusing on the advancement of high-speed electrified powertrain technologies specifically engineered for E-trucks. This strategic alliance targets a shared goal of initiating mass production by 2027, marking a major milestone in the transition to clean energy solutions in commercial transportation. Objective of the Collaboration This partnership facilitates the creation and advancement of Proof of Concepts (PoCs) for e-powertrain systems designed for both light-duty and heavy-duty trucks. The aim is to enhance energy efficiency and simplify the vehicle integration process. By focusing on these innovative technologies, Garrett and SinoTruk hope to accelerate the integration of zero-emission solutions within the commercial vehicle sector, particularly capturing the growing market in China. Leadership Perspectives Olivier Rabiller, the CEO of Garrett, expressed enthusiasm about the alliance, stating, “Garrett's capability to handle high-speed electric motors allows us to design significantly smaller and lighter electrified powertrains while maintaining leading energy efficiency. This partnership with SinoTruk will not only accelerate the development of high-speed solutions but also play a crucial role in achieving global emission reduction objectives.” He emphasized that E-trucks could be operational by 2027, setting an industry standard in power density. Innovation and Market Leadership Wang Chen, the President of SinoTruk, echoed the sentiment of innovation, remarking, “This collaboration marks a significant milestone in our efforts to introduce cutting-edge, zero-emission solutions within the commercial vehicle sector. We aim to leverage Garrett’s high-speed E-drive alongside our transmission expertise, ensuring we deliver top-quality technologies for our fleet customers.” Garrett Motion Inc.: A Brief Overview Garrett Motion has been a key player in the automotive industry for nearly 70 years, known for its advanced turbocharging technologies. The company specializes in developing transformative technologies that promote cleaner and more efficient vehicle operations. Garrett's commitment to zero emissions encompasses a broad variety of applications, serving both passenger and commercial vehicles. Garrett's Commitment to Sustainability The company’s innovative portfolio includes electric turbos, electric compressors, and fuel cell technologies that align with the industry's shift towards sustainability. With a strong network of R&D centers and manufacturing sites across more than 20 countries, Garrett is at the forefront of engineering solutions that empower the transportation industry to progress towards greener alternatives. Contact Information for Garrett Motion Inc. For further inquiries or more details regarding the Garrett and SinoTruk collaboration, interested parties can reach out via the following contacts: Media Inquiries: Amanda Jones Phone: +41.79.601.07.87 Email: [amanda.jones@garrettmotion.com](mailto:amanda.jones@garrettmotion.com) Investor Relations: Eric Birge Phone: +1.734.392.5504 Email: [eric.birge@garrettmotion.com](mailto:eric.birge@garrettmotion.com) Frequently Asked Questions What is the significance of Garrett and SinoTruk's partnership? This partnership is crucial for the development of advanced electric powertrains for commercial vehicles, aiming for mass production of E-trucks by 2027. What products are being developed under this collaboration? The partnership focuses on developing high-speed electrified powertrains designed for both light and heavy trucks, enhancing zero-emission technologies. How will this affect the commercial vehicle market? The collaboration aims to expand the adoption of zero-emission solutions within the commercial vehicle sector, addressing growing environmental concerns. What is Garrett Motion Inc.'s expertise? Garrett Motion specializes in turbocharging technologies, electric turbine systems, and fuel cell solutions, driving advancements in cleaner vehicle performance. How can I contact Garrett Motion for more information? You can reach out to their media or investor relations representatives through the provided email addresses to get more information.
